Body: Possible Duplicate:  How do I access by android phone from web browser and control it?  I bought Galaxy S3 to my fiancee as a gift but she could not manage it and install APN and contacts and some apps, I am looking for free or commercial software or app, so I could help her managing her phone under her supervision.Thank you guys I have to help her get internet on her phone, so we could use communications apps.My phone calls bill is really expensive
